name: Slack ESS Approval Response - MySQL ESS Database
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: bot_command_v2
code.description: New netsuite validate_engines check command to Slack Workbot

input.name: validate_engines
input.parameters:
[
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Flag",
    "parse_output": "integer_conversion",
    "name": "flag",
    "type": "integer",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Dedicated hosted engines change",

    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Internal ID",

    "type": "string",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",

    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Existing engines",

    "type": "integer",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Product key",
    "name": "productKey",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",

    "name": "expirationDate",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Temae",
    "name": "temae",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Csm",
    "name": "csm",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Sales rep",
    "name": "salesRep",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "prompt": "false"
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Customer ID",
    "name": "customerID",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false
  },
  {
    "control_type": "text",

properties.label: status
properties.name: status
properties.hint: Defaults to nil if not supplied.

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Search by
extended_input_schema.hint: Provide one or more entry fields to search the entry

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in ess_engine
block.description: Select rows in ess_engine table in MySQL

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable

block.comment: search through ESS database for Licensing history with status equals "pending-approval"

block.name: update_rows
block.title: Update rows in ess_engine
block.description: Update rows in ess_engine table in MySQL
block.comment: Change the engine status from "pending-approval" to "pending" so that it will be provisioned

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2

input.text: There is a failure in provisioning of the new ESS engine '#{_('data.foreach.d159b3ea.engine_id')}' !

block.comment: post autoprovisioning failure notiification to #ess_automation_notifications channel

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: update_rows
block.title: Update rows in ess_engine
block.description: Update rows in ess_engine table in MySQL
block.comment: Change the engine status from "pending-approval" to "denied"

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To clear the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
